page.title: 08THAKEHAM VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: {Village Day}is when people gather for a big party. The first Village Day was in 1977, the children had a mug to remember it. At Village Day they sell all sorts of things like plants,cakes, and pictures. Sewing and flowers are displayed. They also have a dog show, pigeon shooting and pony riding. Lots of people use the Village Day to show others what they can do, the Gardeners' Club have a display, and people play Bingo and Stool Ball. There are other activities in the village;there is a{Motor-cycle Show,a {Christmas Dinner, an Easter Tea Party} and a{New Year Party}for the elderly.The whole Parish benefits from the Village Day. Every other year there is a{Flower {Festival}in the church.Money is raised for a Worthing Hospice and the Church. The flowers are shown for 4 days.
